## Feature Summary
A brief description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Why would this feature be useful? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution
If you have ideas on how to implement this, describe them here.

## For New Protocols
If you're suggesting a new protocol to add:

- **Protocol Name:** [e.g., TUIC, Naive, etc.]
- **Why this protocol?** [What makes it useful for circumvention?]
- **Links:** [Documentation, GitHub repo, etc.]
- **Willing to contribute?** [Yes/No - PRs welcome!]

## Alternatives Considered
Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
Any other context, screenshots, or examples.
